pr_title: Try to make the cron help clearer

timeline.message: Try to make the cron help clearer

timeline.bodyText: Are you sure this can ever be odd hours? Have you tried this?
timeline.author: daniel-beck

replies.bodyText:
I haven't tried. But if it doesn't support this, then the description should be change to explain that you can't do this.
Normal crontab apparently doesn't distinguish between odd/even:
“At minute 0 past every 2nd hour from 8 through 15.”
“At minute 0 past every 2nd hour from 9 through 16.”
And note that one of the items talked about the problem of using days/3.
